verses.content: LALPA chu inpâk ro, Aw ka hringna, LALPA chu inpâk rawh.
Ka dam sûng po chun LALPA chu inpâk ka ta, Ka hring sûng po chun ka Pathien inpâkin hla sak ka tih.
Mi lienhai chu ring naw unla, Mihriem naupa ṭhangpuina hrim hrim um nawna chu, ring bawk naw ro.
A thuokin a suok san a, ama chu leihnuoiah a kîr nâwk a, Chu ni ngei chun a ngaituona- hai chu a bo nghâl a nih.
Jakob Pathien ṭhangpuitua nei chu lâwmtakin a um hlak; LALPA Pathiena beiseina neitu chu.
Ama chu hnuoi dâm, vân dâm, Tuisuoriet dâm le an sûnga um po po siemtu a nih; Ama chun thutak kumkhuoa dingin a vawng ṭha hlak a nih.
Ama chun nêksâwrna tuorhai ta dingin ro a rêl hlak, Ama chun phîngṭâmhai kuomah bu a pêk hlak. LALPA chun mi intânghai chu ân suoktir hlak.
LALPA chun mitdelhai mit a sukvar hlak a, LALPA chun kûn ngâwi ngâwi hai chu a keitho hlak a; LALPA chun mi felhai chu a hmangai hlak.
LALPA chun mikhuolhai chu a vawng ṭha hlak a, Pa neilo le hmeithai chu a chel zing hlak a; Mi rilohai lampui ruok chu a sukletling hlak.
LALPA chu kumkhawtluongin lalah ṭhung a ta, Aw Zion, i Pathien chu suon po po chenin lalah ṭhung a tih. LALPA chu inpâk ro.
